tool_description: This API is for individuals or organizations that are seeking accurate and up-to-date prayer times in Malaysia. Drawing from data provided by JAKIM, the API offers a convenient and user-friendly way to access today's prayer times
name: Malaysia Prayer Time
title: Malaysia Prayer Time

api_list.name: Prayer Time Schedule
api_list.description:
Get Prayer Time Schedule by period.

- today
- week
- month
- year

For List of Zone, please read the README
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://malaysia-prayer-time.p.rapidapi.com/v1/PrayerTimeSchedule/MLK01/today"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "malaysia-prayer-time.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://malaysia-prayer-time.p.rapidapi.com/v1/PrayerTimeSchedule/{zone}/{period}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "malaysia-prayer-time.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
